title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 78.4 - Penalties relating to unstamped or unlawfully stamped packages of cigarettes and unaffixed false, altered or counterfeit cigarette tax stamps, imprints or impressions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 78.4 - Penalties relating to unstamped or unlawfully stamped packages of cigarettes and unaffixed false, altered or counterfeit cigarette tax stamps, imprints or impressions

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 481(1)(b)
(a) In addition to any other penalty imposed
by the Tax Law, any person who has in its possession or control, unstamped or
unlawfully stamped packages of cigarettes or unaffixed false, altered or
counterfeit cigarette tax stamps, imprints or impressions is subject to a
penalty as provided for in Tax Law, section 481(1)(b). (b) The penalty imposed pursuant to this
section shall be determined, assessed, collected and paid in the same manner as
the taxes imposed by article 20 of the Tax Law. Provided however, such penalty
shall not be paid by the use of stamps. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
78.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
